name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】LET THIS RAIN SHAMAN SHINE YOUR DAY!! REAL NO FAKE 100%!! EHEK! #KoboKanaeru3D [8xF1xccpc98]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru gets dramatic over a cardboard cutout of Magni Dezmond. Anya Melfissa and Mori Calliope intervene to make her focus on her 3D showcase.
Performance of 'Endless Tears' by Kobo Kanaeru and Mori Calliope in a virtual park setting.
scenes.song_name: Endless Tears feat. 中村舞子

subtitles.original: MAGIIII!
subtitles.english: MAGIIII!

subtitles.original: Udah, udah, udah. Nggak usah ribut.
subtitles.english: Enough, enough. No need to make a fuss.

subtitles.original: Masa kardus ginian doang diributin.
subtitles.english: Are you really making a fuss over just a cardboard cutout?

subtitles.original: Ini bukan kardus ya!
subtitles.english: This is not cardboard!

subtitles.original: [Suara menangis]
subtitles.english: [Crying sounds]

subtitles.original: Eh, eh, mohon maaf nih.
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, sorry about this.

subtitles.original: Demi kebaikan kamu, mendingan kamu fokus 3D dulu.
subtitles.english: For your own good, you'd better focus on your 3D showcase first.

subtitles.original: Emang boleh?
subtitles.english: Is that allowed?

subtitles.original: Ini kubawa dulu ya.
subtitles.english: I'll take this for now.

subtitles.original: Balikin!
subtitles.english: Give it back!

subtitles.original: Semangat 3D!
subtitles.english: Good luck with your 3D!

subtitles.original: Tidak, jangan pacar aku... Magni manis...
subtitles.english: No, don't, my boyfriend... Sweet Magni...

subtitles.original: Endless Tears feat. 中村舞子
subtitles.english: Endless Tears feat. Maiko Nakamura

subtitles.original: 君の心に包まれたまま 愛を誓い
subtitles.english: Wrapped in your heart, I swear my love

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜何度過ぎてもね 受け止めて
subtitles.english: No matter how many sleepless nights pass, accept me

subtitles.original: 今すぐ会いたい 涙止まらない 触れたくて
subtitles.english: I want to see you right now, tears won't stop, I want to touch you

subtitles.original: 好きだから 苦しくて
subtitles.english: Because I love you, it's painful

subtitles.original: 君のことを想うほど
subtitles.english: The more I think of you

subtitles.original: この涙こぼれるの
subtitles.english: These tears overflow

subtitles.original: このまま会えないとしても
subtitles.english: Even if we can't meet like this

subtitles.original: 誰より 好きだから
subtitles.english: Because I love you more than anyone

subtitles.original: バイバイさっきしたばかりなのに
subtitles.english: Even though we just said goodbye

subtitles.original: 会いたいが また溢れるの
subtitles.english: The desire to see you overflows again

subtitles.original: 消えてしまいそうなあの日のワンキス
subtitles.english: That one kiss that day that seems like it might vanish

subtitles.original: 君からのメールを待つの
subtitles.english: I wait for a message from you

subtitles.original: 君と会えば狭まるタイムリミット
subtitles.english: The time limit narrows when I meet you

subtitles.original: 二人の時間 大事に
subtitles.english: Cherishing our time together

subtitles.original: バイバイしてもまた会いたい
subtitles.english: Even if we say goodbye, I want to see you again

subtitles.original: 君とのメールでまた再会
subtitles.english: Reuniting again through your messages

subtitles.original: 変わる景色 街はトワイライト
subtitles.english: The scenery changes, the city is in twilight

subtitles.original: いそのこと君を奪い去りたい
subtitles.english: I'd rather just snatch you away

subtitles.original: 君の温もりが消える頃
subtitles.english: By the time your warmth fades away

subtitles.original: 夢から覚めれば現実のドア
subtitles.english: If I wake from the dream, it's the door of reality

subtitles.original: 君のことを想うほど
subtitles.english: The more I think of you

subtitles.original: この涙こぼれるの
subtitles.english: These tears overflow

subtitles.original: このまま会えないとしても
subtitles.english: Even if we can't meet like this

subtitles.original: 誰より 好きだから
subtitles.english: Because I love you more than anyone

subtitles.original: I love you... Love you... I love you... Love you...
subtitles.english: I love you... Love you... I love you... Love you...

subtitles.original: I love you... Love you...
subtitles.english: I love you... Love you...

subtitles.original: 夜が明ければ 探す君だけを
subtitles.english: If the night dawns, I'll search only for you

subtitles.original: I love you... Love you... I love you... Love you...
subtitles.english: I love you... Love you... I love you... Love you...

subtitles.original: I love you... Love you...
subtitles.english: I love you... Love you...

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば My love for you
subtitles.english: If I close my eyes, my love for you

subtitles.original: あなたと...
subtitles.english: With you...

subtitles.original: 今すぐ会いたい 限りあるタイム
subtitles.english: I want to see you right now, limited time

subtitles.original: 永遠の愛 信じてはみたい
subtitles.english: I want to believe in eternal love

subtitles.original: 離れること考えると胸が真っ二つに
subtitles.english: The thought of being apart splits my heart in two

subtitles.original: 避けるようにタイト
subtitles.english: Tight as if to avoid it

subtitles.original: 可愛げなフェイス よければ抱いて
subtitles.english: A cute face, hold me if you'd like

subtitles.original: 引き裂かれるカウントダウンのようにブレイク
subtitles.english: Break like a countdown being torn apart

subtitles.original: Love baby, love baby 言葉をフリーズ
subtitles.english: Love baby, love baby, freeze the words

subtitles.original: ショーが始まった また次のシーン
subtitles.english: The show has started, on to the next scene

subtitles.original: 想えば想うほど 降り積もる思い
subtitles.english: The more I think of you, the more my feelings pile up

subtitles.original: 会えば会うほど...
subtitles.english: The more we meet...

subtitles.original: そばにいたいと 強く願うほど 明日さえ見えなくて
subtitles.english: The more I strongly wish to be by your side, I can't even see tomorrow

subtitles.original: いつか見つけるまで 離したくはない
subtitles.english: Until I find you someday, I don't want to let go

subtitles.original: 離れたくはない
